content: JOHANNESBURG Datatec Ltd  unveiled plans on Tuesday to sell its Westcon-Comstor American operations to Synnex Corp   a deal worth up to $800 million that allows the South African IT firm to offload part of a problematic business.
name: Synnex Corporation
title: Synnex Corp buys Westcon-Comstor Americas from South Africa's Datatec for $800 million

content: * Deal expected to close in Q3 (Adds comment by Datatec's CEO)
name: Synnex Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Synnex Corp buys Westcon-Comstor Americas from S.Africa's Datatec for $800 mln

content: JOHANNESBURG  June 6 South African information technology firm Datatec Ltd will sell its Westcon-Comstor Americas business to Synnex Corp for up to $800 million  the company said on Tuesday.
name: Synnex Corporation
title: South Africa's Datatec to sell Americas business to Synnex

content: * Synnex to acquire westcon-comstor north america and latin america businesses
name: Synnex Corporation
title: BRIEF-Synnex to buy Westcon-Comstor Americas business
